data: Vincent G. J. Rodgers Vincent G. J. Rodgers Professor and Director of Graduate Studies vincent-rodgers@uiowa.edu Ph.D., Syracuse University, 1985 513 VAN (319) 335-1219 http://homepage.physics.uiowa.edu/~vrodgers/ Theoretical particle physics; string theory. Topics include string theory with applications in gravitation, cosmology, superstring theories as unified theory, gauge/gravity correspondence Numerical techniques developed for solutions in quantum chromodynamics (QCD), string theory Students also: interact with students at other universities; participate in interdisciplinary work with mathematics department Students develop mathematical skills including analytical, numerical, and symbolic methods
